metadata.Title: CVE-2020-9549 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: In PDFResurrect 0.12 through 0.19, get_type in pdf.c has an out-of-bounds write via a crafted PDF document. It was discovered that PDFResurrect incorrectly handled certain memory operations during PDF summary generation. An attacker could use this to cause out-of-bounds writes, resulting in a denial of service (system crash) or arbitrary code execution.

criterions.comment: pdfresurrect: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
